fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grant a player one tier of defense higher than what they currently have. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect, Control, and Roleblock immune.
- You may act while dead.
- You may only target Unstable (1714).
- Unstable (1714) will always spawn and you know who they are.
- If your ability saves a player, you are considered to have won immediately.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep Unstable (1714) alive at all costs.
